name: Kadiapattanam Beach
description: Kadiyapattinam is a small Village in Kurunthancode Block in Kanniyakumari District of Tamil Nadu State, India. It comes under Muttom Panchayath. It is located 15 KM towards west from District head quarters Nagercoil. 7 KM from Kurunthencode. 743 KM from State capital Chennai.
